languages.text: "И ты пош{mf|ел|ла} за тем, что звало из-за ширмы. Позволил{mf||а} {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}вывести{/d} тебя из огня".
"And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}lead{/d} you out of the fire."
languages.original_text: "И ты пош{mf|ел|ла} за тем, что звало из-за ширмы. Позволил{mf||а} {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}вывести{/d} тебя из огня".

traits.locale_text: "And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it lead you out of the fire."
"And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it lead you out of the fire."
"And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it lead you out of the fire."
"And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it lead you out of the fire."
"And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it lead you out of the fire."
"And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it lead you out of the fire."
"And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}lead{/d} you out of the fire."

languages.text: « Et vous avez suivi ce qui vous appelait depuis l'autre côté du rideau. Vous l'avez laissé vous {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}mener{/d} hors du feu. »
languages.original_text: "And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}lead{/d} you out of the fire."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous avez suivi ce qui vous appelait depuis l'autre côté du rideau. Vous l'avez laissé vous mener hors du feu. »

languages.text: “你跟随着那个在帷幕后面呼唤你的东西，让它{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}带着你{/d}走出火场。”
languages.original_text: "And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}lead{/d} you out of the fire."

traits.locale_text: “你跟随着那个在帷幕后面呼唤你的东西，让它带着你走出火场。”

languages.text: "Und Ihr seid dem gefolgt, was von hinter dem Vorhang gerufen hat. Ihr habt Euch davon aus dem Feuer {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}führen{/d} lassen."
languages.original_text: "And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}lead{/d} you out of the fire."

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr seid dem gefolgt, was von hinter dem Vorhang gerufen hat. Ihr habt Euch davon aus dem Feuer führen lassen."

languages.text: «Y tú seguiste a lo que estaba detrás del telón. Dejaste que te {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}ayudara{/d} a escapar del fuego».
languages.original_text: "And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}lead{/d} you out of the fire."

traits.locale_text: «Y tú seguiste a lo que estaba detrás del telón. Dejaste que te ayudara a escapar del fuego».

languages.text: 「あなたはカーテンの向こうから呼びかけてくるものに従った。そして、火から出ろと{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}案内{/d}する声のままに歩いた」
languages.original_text: "And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}lead{/d} you out of the fire."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはカーテンの向こうから呼びかけてくるものに従った。そして、火から出ろと{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}案内{/d}する声のままに歩いた」

languages.text: "Siz de perdenin ardından sesleneni takip ettiniz. Sizi ateşten {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}çıkarmasına{/d} izin verdiniz."
languages.original_text: "And you followed that which was calling from behind the curtain. You let it {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentWithTheodora}lead{/d} you out of the fire."

traits.locale_text: "Siz de perdenin ardından sesleneni takip ettiniz. Sizi ateşten çıkarmasına izin verdiniz."
